description: square pendant; three-dimensional, with design on front made of applied twisted and untwisted silver wire; two central chevrons with spiral ends; edges decorated with wavy vertical lines bordered with twisted wire strands; core of pendant may be wood; chain without clasp or closure, attached to pendant by looping (chains for .42 and .44 received separated from pendants)
dimension:
2 x 2 x 7/16 in. (5.08 x 5.08 x 1.11 cm) (pendant only)
23 in. (58.42 cm) (object part, chain length, approx.)
title: Pendant with chain
